import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useQuery } from "react-query"; import { withRouter } from "react-router"; import OnboardingSideBar from "../components/OnboardingSideBar"; import {useForm} from "react-hook-form"; import { getBvn, validateOTP } from "../clients/bvn"; const Bvn =(props:any)=> { const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) const [displayMsg, setDisplayMsg] = useState(null) const [otpMsg, setOtpMsg] = useState(null) const { register, setValue, handleSubmit, errors } = useForm(); const onSubmit = async (datas : any)=>{ setLoading(true) let data = null; console.log('yes') try { setLoading(false) setValue("bvn", "") setValue("otp", "") if (displayMsg) { console.log('no') data = await validateOTP(); console.log(data) setOtpMsg(data.message); } data = await getBvn(); setDisplayMsg(data.message) } catch (error) { console.log(error) } } return ( <> {/* Desktop view */} <>

BVN DETAILS

{ otpMsg ?

{otpMsg}

: <>

{displayMsg?displayMsg:"We hate to ask, but regulations mandate us to.
Your BVN is safe with us!"}

{displayMsg? <> : <> {errors.bvn && errors.bvn.type === "required" && (

Please fill out this field.

)} {errors.bvn && errors.bvn.type === "minLength" && (

Minimum BVN length is 11.

)} }
}
{/* End of Desktop View */} {/* Mobile view */}

Profile Update


BVN DETAILS

We hate to ask, but regulations mandate us to.
Your BVN is safe with us!


{/* End of Mobile View */} ); } export default withRouter(Bvn);
